verbs.description: ihop changes [V: name] back from ihob on monday the pancake house chain reverted to its long - standing name after a temporary switch to ihob last month with the b standing for burgers by flipping the p to b the restaurant generated some buzz to promote a new line - up of beef patties twitter ihop
